Text.val: 03.06.2013 GB SCR18163 Changed query for selection
02.02.2012 SH SCR17092 Added new SCFH fields for update and introduced INVS_SREG_ID
13.12.2010 SH SCR16062 Replaced INVS_DUEDATE by INVS_SFIP_PAYMENTDATE
06.12.2010 SH SCR16043 Adjusted seelction of INFS in task "Update INVS"

SQL_STMT_U.val: select distinct a.INVS_SFIP_PAYMENTDATE from :1/INVS a where a.INVS_RECP_SCFH_ID = 0 and a.INVS_ADMNO = :2 and a.INVS_CLNTNO = :3 and a.INVS_SFIP_PAYMENTDATE < ':4' and a.INVS_CLNA_ID > 0 and a.INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT > 0 and a.INVS_BPIV_BTCH_ID > 0 and not (exists(select * from :1/INVS b where b.INVS_ADMNO = :2 and b.INVS_CLNTNO = :3 and b.INVS_SFIP_PAYMENTDATE = a.INVS_SFIP_PAYMENTDATE and b.INVS_CLNA_ID > 0 and b.INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT > 0 and b.INVS_BPIV_BTCH_ID = 0 ))
